thread.title: Genie Bouchard celebrates holidays with family in Montreal: 'Merry Christmas from the gang'
thread.title_full: Genie Bouchard celebrates holidays with family in Montreal: 'Merry Christmas from the gang'

author: People
title: Genie Bouchard celebrates holidays with family in Montreal: 'Merry Christmas from the gang'
text:
Yahoo Canada Style Genie Bouchard celebrates holidays with family in Montreal: 'Merry Christmas from the gang' The 29-year-old athlete spent the holidays with her family in her hometown of Montreal. Read full article Ellie Spina · Writer Updated December 28, 2023 at 6:49 p.m. · 2 min read Genie Bouchard is spending the holidays with her family in her hometown. (Photo by Matt McNulty/Getty Images for ITF)
Genie Bouchard is sharing a glimpse of how she spent the holidays with her family .
The Canadian tennis star, 29, took to Instagram on Wednesday with a carousel of "cozy" candid photos celebrating Christmas morning with her loved ones in her hometown of Montreal.
In the snaps , the athlete went makeup-free and wore her hair in a loose ponytail, while she matched her family in blue and green flannel pyjamas paired with white slippers. The four of them posed in front of a festive backdrop, including a Christmas tree, small wreath and fireplace.
Bouchard kept her caption short and sweet, wishing her fans a merry Christmas "from the gang."
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard)
In the comments, fans wished Bouchard a merry Christmas and praised her "adorable" family photo.
Christie Brinkley , model, actress and mother of Bouchard's boyfriend, Jack Brinkley Cook , commented in both English and French, nodding to Bouchard's French-Canadian roots: "Merry Christmas, beautiful Bouchards! Joyeux Noël!"
"Merry Christmas. Beautiful family," a fan wrote .
"Good genes," someone else quipped .
"Adorable! I love a Canadian family Christmas photo. Classic! Happy holidays to you and yours," commented another.
"Did someone say cozy?!" another added .
Earlier this month, the Montreal-native shared her love for winter fashion with another carousel of photos on Instagram.
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard)
Posing outdoors in New York City, Bouchard donned a pair of blue ripped jeans, a white knit Aritzia top, a long beige coat from Max Mara and white pointed-toe knee-high Stuart Weitzman boots. Completing her look, the athlete accessorized with a thin black leather belt and a taupe Hermès handbag.
She celebrated the brisk weather in her caption, writing , "I get so excited dressing up for cold weather."
Story continues Fans swooned over Bouchard's look and poked fun at her "Canadianness."
"Canadian girlies know how to dress in cold weather, period," an Instagram user quipped .
"Very pretty, fellow Canadian," someone chimed in .
"Looking very stylish, Genie," penned another.
One fan joked : "Your Canadianness is showing."
Let us know what you think by commenting below and tweeting @ YahooStyleCA ! Follow us on Twitter and Instagram .
